iristk.audio

Class Microphone

  • java.lang.Object
    • iristk.audio.AudioPort
      • iristk.audio.AudioSource
        • iristk.audio.Microphone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Microphone
extends AudioSource
    Microphone is an AudioSource that actively reads audio from the sound card. To access this audio, one or more AudioListeners must be attached.
